item.title: Automation Station
item.description: Why? Improved workflow Looks cool (obviously should have been #1) Saved on typing How Share .dotfiles Make joke about dot dotfiles Share 2 specific functions/aliases/automations The who? Heading writes it’s own joke Everyone needs to do this. Regardless of skill set
